name: COLOURSHOOTER
description:
Pew pew! Defend the galaxy from waves of aliens in this fast-paced shooter game created with PuzzleScript. Best enjoyed with sound.

Controls:
Arrow keys -- player movement
'X' -- shoot/speed up game
'R' -- restart level

Link to source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=f6883aab33c1f00d6a827ac277b3aa43
